logentry.msg: kupu drawers must have moved as some point, this should fix the ability to add links in kupu

logentry.msg: classpath set to libraries instead classes

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Starting to separate API from implementation. The API Java files are left where they were to keep the impact minimal for the moment. Implementation files will be moved to the src/impl directory.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added missing UsecaseAuthorizer after separating API from implementation (sorry)

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Improved build process: use specific classpath when compiling modules, pubs, and core implementation

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Moved tests to impl/test, fixed test classpath

logentry.msg: Build process: Fixed classpath parameter (refid attribute changed to value)

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Moved AC cache classes from API to impl

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Moved AC usecases back from impl to API, improved AC API for a better separation between API and impl

logentry.msg: Build process: Make pub + module libs available for compiling pubs + modules

logentry.msg: Moved workflow implementation from API to impl

logentry.author: michi
logentry.msg: defaultpub and notification added such that Lenya compiles again

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Removed notification + default pub classes from API, moved defaultpub usecases to module to make them available to other modules

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Moved usecase scheduler implementation from API to impl

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Moved some usecase implementation classes from API to impl

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Removed source extensions from content. This way, source files can be read without knowing the source extension, i.e., without accessing the meta data. This solves several problems and simplifies the code.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [temporary] removed feed meta file to make room for the new content file, added meta file in new location

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Blog: moved index.xml content file to index (removed extension)

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Removed deprecated + obsolete Creator interface. The functionality of the NewBlogEntryCreator has been moved to the CreateBlogEntry usecase.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Obtain ODT content using the lenyadoc:/ protocol. This works now because the extension isn't part of the source path anymore.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Obtain ODT content using the lenyadoc:/ protocol. This works now because the extension isn't part of the source path anymore.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [Refactoring] splitted Session and DocumentIdentityMap into interface and implementation. This will hopefully allow to move the transaction handling code from API to impl.

logentry.author: antonio
logentry.msg: Use LRUMap instead of deprecated CacheMap.

logentry.msg: Removed dependency from DefaultDocumentBuilder to DefaultDocument

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Moved some publication classes from API to impl. The collection interface doesn't extend Document anymore, now the CollectionImpl uses delegation instead of inheritance.

logentry.author: andreas

logentry.msg: Session extends UnitOfWork. This removes the dependency from SourceNode to SessionImpl.
